title: "DDSA High-Performance Computing Workshop"
Organizers: Jennifer Bartell
date: 2025-05-23
Dates: "23 May 2025"
Location: DDSA
categories: [workshop, DDSA]
---

1-day all-inclusive workshop on High-Performance Computing (HPC) for Bachelors and Masters students enrolled at Danish universities. Several Sandbox staff represented the project and help with the practical part, and Jennifer Bartell gave a lecture on National HPCs.
